title: Firewing
description: Firewing is hot! On the bestseller lists for months, Firewing’s Canadian sales are over 75,000 copies, and—like its predecessors, Silverwing and Sunwing —it has been nominated for a slew of awards. Just released in the US, Firewing is gathering accolades and great sales in equal measure. With the animated Silverwing series about to debut on Teletoon in the fall of 2003, this new mass market edition of Firewing is ready to soar!
author: Kenneth Oppel
